DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy desvenlafaxine succinate ( DVS ) treatment moderate severe vasomotor symptom ( VMS ) associate menopause , also assess effect DVS sleep parameter health outcome indicator .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating DVS-233 SR Treat Vasomotor Systems Associated With Menopause
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy , postmenopausal woman seek treatment hot flush Minimum 7 moderate severe hot flush per day 50 per week record 7 consecutive day screen Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less equal 40 kg/m2 Other inclusion apply . Hypersensitivity Venlafaxine History seizure disorder History myocardial infarction unstable angina within 6 month Other exclusion apply .
